mapper.insert: insert into notice( notice_id, emp_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, notice_hit ) values( notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{emp_id}, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content} where notice_id=#{notice_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY notice_date DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM < = #{limit}) WHERE rnum > = #{start }
select * from notice_reply where notice_id=#{notice_id} order by nreply_date
select e_name from employee where emp_id=#{emp_id}
select count(*) from employee where emp_id=#{emp_id}
select e_pwd from employee where emp_id=#{emp_id}
